mapper.select: SELECT c.name AS categoryName, IFNULL(SUM(t.amount), 0) AS totalIncome FROM t_category c LEFT JOIN T_TRANSACTION t ON t.cid = c.id and YEAR (t.trans_time) = #{year} AND t.`username` = #{username} WHERE c.type = 1 AND c.level = 2 GROUP BY c.id, c.name

SELECT IFNULL(c.path,"undefined") AS categoryName, IFNULL(SUM(t.amount), 0) AS totalExpense, COUNT(t.id) AS count FROM T_TRANSACTION t LEFT JOIN t_category c ON c.id = t.cid WHERE t.type = 2 AND YEAR (t.trans_time) = #{year} AND t.`username` = #{username} GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY totalExpense DESC
